metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19970 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In phpMyAdmin before 4.8.4, an XSS vulnerability was found in the navigation tree, where an attacker can deliver a payload to a user through a crafted database/table name. It was discovered that phpMyAdmin incorrectly handled user input. An attacker could possibly use this for an XSS attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19970` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.6-5ubuntu0.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.6-5ubuntu0.5').
